|brand = Netgear |model = WAC124 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/04/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_WAC124 |wlclass = AC2000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY318100410 |icid = 4054A-18100410 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = CHJ00-1.6 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT;MT7621AT, 1724-AMTH, CTPFAT98, DTPFAR85; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15T1G1664A-AZC1; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:40:D0, |oui = CC:40:D0,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.2.1.0; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, (57600 8N1),, J4, |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = power switch, |addchip = 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Diodes Incorporated;AZ1117E;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.100 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEAR-1 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/03/2018 |estreldate = 01/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449135756 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA1YH98X2314 |asin = B01N47QKDQ |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603EN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <!-- {{FCC ST|10/31/2018|indexme.}} --> "CHJ00-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same as the [[Netgear R6260]] ([[SerComm]]).
As with the [[Netgear R6260]] they are assumed to be :[[MediaTek MT7615]] and [[MediaTek]] MT7603E. Radio Chip IDs are not visible.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[MediaTek]]'' [[MediaTek MT7621AT|MT7621AT]] [[MIPS]] Dual Core/Quad Thread 1004Kc (@880MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 128MB SLC NAND Flash *WiFi: [[MediaTek MT7615N]] (802.11an+ac), [[MediaTek]] MT7603EN (802.11bgn) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = wac124 build 45820 20210223 |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
